actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to render assistance to the State of Louisiana to reconstruct Fort Saint Jean Baptiste de Natchitoches, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to assist the State of Louisiana in reconstructing Fort Saint Jean Baptiste de Natchitoches provided the reconstruction is based on historical documentation and Federal expenditures do not exceed more than 75 percent of the project's costs. Authorizes appropriations for such assistance.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to render assistance to the State of Louisiana to reconstruct Fort Saint Jean Baptiste de Natchitoches, and for other purposes.
